post.body: I like your new Twitter avatar. Twittertar? Avatwit? Hmmm LOL
I hope u feel better sooooon!!
woot for us dorks!!
that's not a good sign when sbux won't even wake you up!!
good luck at the dentist and the interview Hun. :)
It is way to fraking cold outside! Winter. I did NOT miss you. Go away now!!
So iPhone 2.2 ....where the hell is the push service we were promised months ago apple??!?? ><
Anyone on here play WoW? If so anyone play horde side on illidan?
Spending some time playing my death knight. Will level my main to 71 today definitely though
I told them whats the diff if sold a few hours early, 7-11s were selling them days ago...their eys went wide and almost burst...it was fun!
Also got into a fight with gamestop employees on the ethics of the streetdate break...they acted like it was against nature..
So got WotLK last night at midnight...installed...played a few quests...and am very excited to have a whole night to play tonight... =o)
http://tinyurl.com/6ooyzq <<very nerdy but cool for any star wars fan!
Ugh. Tired. Glad I survived raiding kara last night!!!
So very very tired today.
Oh and BTW the belkin n52te DOES work with leopard, im saying this because in my initial research many sites were saying it doesnt
REALLLLY loving my new belkin n52te gamepad controller for playing WoW...has made casting and moving sooo much easier and fun!
nervous about this election...I hope we don't get stuck with another moron in office for the next 4 years
Also NOT looking forward to the Halloween party I have to go to tonight. Not at all :(
Ugh. Had bad Thai food today. I say ugh.
I need more time in my life...so far behind in TV shows Ive DL'd and comic books too...ugh...can have more time please?
7 mins to go...then im..OUT of HERE!
Would so rather be at home today in my nice warm apt plating WoW with @krozzi !!
Ugh shoulder really hurts from falling asleep on the couch last night. Ouch
It's cold and I'm super sleepy. Ugh
Ugh. Really not feeling great at all today. :( fail
It's just a little snow people. It happens every frelling year. Now drive!!!
Test results came back good. I'm no more broken then I already was. Got some meds to help the stomach cramping too. :)
Man people on my phones today are extra crispy stupid.
Still playing rock band as the horribley cold and snowy weather rocks on outside. Ugh
I can't sing. However singing on rock band with no fail mode is Ã¼ber fun!! Plus I make up my own words to songs and weird al yancovik them
Playing rock band 2 with some friends!!
Woke up with huge headache. Starting to feel better though. Gonna take a shower and see if that helps some
Well so much for getting 7 to 12 inches of snow. More like one inch really. LOL. Stupid weathermen
About to go play some serious WoW! Woot!
Downloaded frenzic for the iPhone. This game rocks!!
Sbux FTW!! Work your wake up magic!!
Ugh this afternoon is dragging. I'd so rather be at home leveling my death knight. Would like to ding 80 by next weekend.
I'm pretty close to singing 76 on my death knight. Hopefully I can get that done tonight since I got more sleep last night & am more awake
man I've slacked at tweeting. Anyway. What's with this harsh winter. Where's global warming when we need it?!?
